name: Boa Hancock
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea
text:
[On Play] If your opponent has 5 or more cards in their hand, your opponent places 1 card from their hand at the bottom of their deck.
[Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Place up to 1 of your Characters at the bottom of the owner's deck: Give your Leader and 1 Character up to 1 rested DON!! card each.
